content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1) and a furnace at position(y1)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) that crafts iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Ensure you have the required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when crafting items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the items you are trying to create.
